${ModID}:Wavycap.NAME: Wavycap
${ModID}:Wavycap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Deal 5 damage. Gain 5 Block. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Gain 3 Block.

${ModID}:Cherryburst.NAME: Cherryburst
${ModID}:Cherryburst.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Rotleaf.NAME: Rotleaf
${ModID}:Rotleaf.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Apply 5 Poison. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Apply 3 Poison to a random enemy.
